description: landscape scene with rising mountain in cream and lavender pigments in URQ; house on a hilly landscape in center that is partially obscured by green mound; brown shading in LRC of image; pale blue sky in background
provenance: (Elizabeth Harvey-Lee, Oxfordshire, England, 2011-17; sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2017-19)
signed: LRC, in margin, in pencil: Engelbert Lap
text: By one estimate, 62 percent of Austria is mountainous, which means that Engelbert Lap never ran out of alpine subjects. He took up art after a long career in the military, which included time in the Dolomites mountain range with the Austro-Hungarian infantry during World War I (1914–18).
title: Tyrolean Farmhouse
